sense.def:
To have an affinity with someone or something
pomeni čutiti, da sodimo k tistemu človeku in ga razumemo.

seg.quote: I had this tremendous sense of affinity with the place.

sense.def:
Če imajo ljudje ali stvari
an affinity with each other
so si v določenih pogledih podobni.

seg.quote: In anatomical structure, Prehistoric Man has close affinities with modern humans.
